name: @desplega.ai/playwright-reporter
description: desplega.ai Playwright Reporter - A custom reporter for Playwright tests that integrates with the desplega.ai platform.

scripts.build: bun build lib/src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.generate-schema: ts-json-schema-generator --path lib/src/types.ts --type ReporterEvent --tsconfig tsconfig.json --expose all --jsDoc extended --strict-tuples --no-ref-encode --no-top-ref --out schemas/reporter-events.schema.json
